cMathFunction Class Reference
[Internal classes]

#include <cmathfunction.h>

Inheritance diagram for cMathFunction:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Registration class for extending NED with new functions.

Stores a pointer to a function taking up to 4 doubles as args and returning a double.

Objects of this class are usually created via the Define_Function() macro.

virtual std::string cMathFunction::info (  )  const [virtual]

Produces a one-line description of the object's contents.

int cMathFunction::getNumArgs (  )  const [inline]

Argument count to function.

MathFunc cMathFunction::getMathFunc (  )  const [inline]

Returns function pointer as double function with unchecked arg list (no type safety!).

MathFuncNoArg cMathFunction::getMathFuncNoArg (  )  const

Returns function pointer as double function with no args.

Throws exception is actual arg count is different.

MathFunc1Arg cMathFunction::getMathFunc1Arg (  )  const

Returns function pointer as double function with 1 double arg.

Throws exception is actual arg count is different.

MathFunc2Args cMathFunction::getMathFunc2Args (  )  const

Returns function pointer as double function with 2 double args.

Throws exception is actual arg count is different.

MathFunc3Args cMathFunction::getMathFunc3Args (  )  const

Returns function pointer as double function with 3 double args.

Throws exception is actual arg count is different.

MathFunc4Args cMathFunction::getMathFunc4Args (  )  const

Returns function pointer as double function with 4 double args.

Throws exception is actual arg count is different.

const char* cMathFunction::getCategory (  )  const [inline]

Returns a string that can be useful in classifying NED functions, e.g.

"trigonometric".

const char* cMathFunction::getDescription (  )  const [inline]

Returns the function's documentation as a string.

int  numArgs 
) [static]

Finds a registered function by name.

Returns NULL if not found.

Throws an error if not found.
